thread.section_title: Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfortable and welcoming
thread.title_full: Comfortable and welcoming - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kim T
title: Comfortable and welcoming
text: I stayed this weekend with my teenage son and niece in a triple room visiting for a theatre and sightseeing break. We had a wonderful stay in a comfy, clean and well maintained room. Breakfast and service was first class and it was a lovely change for a London hotel to have such friendly staff looking after us. The hotel was reasonably priced and only a couple of minutes from Angel tube station. I would highly recommend this hotel and will definitely be returning.
